sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement"> <x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_development_estimate>2</base_development_estimate> <default_quantity>16</default_quantity> <name>Apply domain separation to tables</name> <notes>Quantity = Number of Tables * Number of Domains</notes> <sys_created_by>mike.cornell@infocenter.io</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-29 20:49:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fe49fa95dbb0e850af7ce8cd139619e1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-30 17:33:06</sys_updated_on> <type>variable</type> </x_icir_dealmaker_application_requirement> </record_update>
